ground_truth: The Kid looks the same, pale and weak, but maybe he's gripping the sheets a little too tightly with his hands. His Grandfather says nothing, just waits. We're back in the boat. Buttercup is treading water. And we're back where we were at the last moment we saw her, Buttercup frozen, the Shrieking Eel, jaws wide, about to clamp down as we see a giant arm pounding the Eel unconscious in one move, then easily lifting Buttercup. The boat and Fezzik, with Buttercup being deposited on the deck. Inigo points behind them. Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands. The boat at dawn is being followed closely by the black sailboat, which we can see for the first time is being sailed by a Man in Black, and his boat almost seems to be flying. And once he's said the name, they rise straight up, sheer from the water, impossibly high, in a wild race for the Cliffs, and the Man in Black is closing faster than ever, but not fast enough, the lead was too great to overcome, and as Inigo sails with great precision straight at the Cliffs, Fezzik reaches up along the cliff face, grabs a jutting rock, reaches behind it. Suddenly there is a thick rope in his hands. He drops back to the boat, gives the rope a freeing swing, and the rope goes all the way to the top. He straps a harness to him, then lifts Buttercup and Vizzini in the harness. Finally, he himself gets in the harness. All three are strapped to Fezzik like papooses, and he starts to ascend the rope, carrying them all along with him as he goes. The Man in Black is sailing in toward the Cliffs of Insanity, watching as Fezzik rises swiftly through the first moments of dawn. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far below. This is the first time we've gotten the real vertigo feeling, and it's a gasper. Fezzik climbing on. Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear. Fezzik is moving right along; however high they are, he's already over a third of the way done. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, starting to climb. He's impossibly far behind, but the way he goes you'd think he didn't know that because he is flying up the rope, hand over hand like lightning. He prods Fezzik, who nods, and increases his pace. The Man in Black is roaring up the rope, cutting deeply into Fezzik's lead, and his arms begin moving much more slowly. Vizzini and the others are getting too close now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off, takes out a knife, and begins to cut the rope, which is tied around a great rock, while Inigo helps the Princess to her feet and Fezzik just stands around, waiting for someone to tell him to do something.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The Child appears the same, pallid and frail, but perhaps he's clutching the linens a tad too firmly with his hands. His Grandfather utters nothing, merely waits. We're back in the vessel. Buttercup is paddling water. And we're back where we were at the final moment we observed her, Buttercup immobilized, the Screeching Eel, jaws open, about to bite down as we see a colossal limb pummeling the Eel insensible in one motion, then effortlessly elevating Buttercup. The vessel and Fezzik, with Buttercup being placed on the deck. Inigo indicates behind them. Vizzini binds Buttercup's hands. The ship at dawn is being pursued closely by the dark yacht, which we can perceive for the initial time is being navigated by a Man in Black, and his craft almost seems to be gliding. And once he's uttered the designation, they elevate straight up, steep from the water, impossibly elevated, in a frantic race for the Cliffs, and the Man in Black is approaching quicker than ever, but not swift enough, the advantage was too vast to surmount, and as Inigo navigates with great accuracy straight at the Cliffs, Fezzik reaches up along the precipice face, grabs a projecting stone, reaches behind it. Unexpectedly there is a thick cord in his hands. He descends back to the vessel, gives the cord a liberating swing, and the cord extends all the way to the summit. He fastens a harness to him, then lifts Buttercup and Vizzini in the harness. Finally, he himself gets in the harness. All three are fastened to Fezzik like infants, and he begins to ascend the cord, conveying them all along with him as he proceeds. The Man in Black is navigating toward the Cliffs of Insanity, observing as Fezzik elevates rapidly through the initial moments of dawn. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far beneath. This is the initial time we've gotten the genuine dizziness sensation, and it's a breath-taker. Fezzik climbing on. Buttercup is almost out of her senses with terror. Fezzik is progressing right along; however elevated they are, he's already over a third of the way finished. The Man in Black jumps from his vessel to the cord, commencing to climb. He's impossibly far behind, but the way he proceeds you'd think he didn't know that because he is soaring up the cord, hand over hand like lightning. He urges Fezzik, who nods, and quickens his tempo. The Man in Black is roaring up the cord, carving deeply into Fezzik's lead, and his arms begin progressing much more gradually. Vizzini and the others are getting too near now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off, takes out a dagger, and begins to sever the cord, which is fastened around a great stone, while Inigo assists the Princess to her feet and Fezzik just stands around, awaiting someone to tell him to do something.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The Kid looks the same, pale and weak, but maybe the sheets are being gripped a little too tightly by his hands. Nothing is said by his Grandfather, who just waits. We're back in the boat. Water is being treaded by Buttercup. And we're back where we were at the last moment we saw her, Buttercup frozen, the Shrieking Eel, jaws wide, about to clamp down as a giant arm is seen pounding the Eel unconscious in one move, then Buttercup is easily lifted. The boat and Fezzik deposit Buttercup on the deck. Behind them, Inigo points. Buttercup's hands are tied by Vizzini. At dawn, the boat closely follows the black sailboat, which we can see for the first time a Man in Black sails, and it almost seems as though his boat is flying. And once the name is said by him, they rise straight up, sheer from the water, impossibly high, in a wild race for the Cliffs, and faster than ever the Man in Black closes, but not fast enough; too great was the lead to overcome, and as Inigo sails with great precision straight at the Cliffs, a jutting rock is grabbed by Fezzik along the cliff face, reaching behind it. Suddenly, a thick rope is in his hands. Back to the boat he drops, and a freeing swing is given to the rope by him, and all the way to the top it goes. A harness is strapped to him, then Buttercup and Vizzini are lifted in the harness by him. Finally, he himself climbs in the harness. All three are strapped to Fezzik like papooses, and up the rope he starts to ascend, carrying them all along with him as he goes. Toward the Cliffs of Insanity, the Man in Black is sailing, watching as Fezzik swiftly rises through the first moments of dawn. Only faintly visible far below is Fezzik's group. This is the first time the real vertigo feeling has been gotten by us, and it's a gasper. Climbing on, Fezzik is. Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear. Right along, Fezzik is moving; however high they are, already over a third of the way he is done. From his ship, the Man in Black leaps to the rope, starting to climb. Impossibly far behind he is, but the way he goes you'd think he didn't know that because the rope is being flown up by him, hand over hand like lightning. Fezzik is prodded by him, who nods and increases his pace. Up the rope the Man in Black is roaring, deeply cutting into Fezzik's lead, and much more slowly his arms begin moving. Too close now, Vizzini and the others are getting. Less than a hundred feet behind them, the Man in Black is. Off, Vizzini leaps, takes out a knife, and begins to cut the rope, which he ties around a great rock, while the Princess is helped to her feet by Inigo and Fezzik just stands around, waiting for someone to tell him to do something.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The Kid appears the same, pale and weak, but perhaps gripping the sheets too tightly. His Grandfather remains silent, just waiting. We're back in the boat. Buttercup is treading water, frozen as the Shrieking Eel, jaws wide, approaches. A giant arm knocks the Eel unconscious and lifts Buttercup onto the boat. Inigo points behind them as Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands. At dawn, a black sailboat, sailed by a Man in Black, follows closely, almost flying. As Inigo sails toward the Cliffs, Fezzik grabs a rock, finds a rope, and swings it to the top. He straps a harness to himself, lifts Buttercup and Vizzini, and ascends the rope with them. The Man in Black sails toward the Cliffs of Insanity, watching Fezzik rise swiftly. Fezzik's group is barely visible below, inducing vertigo. Buttercup is terrified, but Fezzik is already a third of the way up. The Man in Black leaps to the rope, climbing rapidly. He prods Fezzik, who increases his pace. The Man in Black closes in, cutting into Fezzik's lead. Vizzini leaps off, takes a knife, and begins cutting the rope tied around a rock, while Inigo helps the Princess and Fezzik waits for instructions.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: The Kid looks pale and weak, gripping the sheets tightly. His Grandfather waits silently. We're back in the boat with Buttercup treading water, frozen as the Shrieking Eel approaches. A giant arm knocks the Eel unconscious and lifts Buttercup onto the boat with Fezzik. Inigo points, and Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands. At dawn, a black sailboat, sailed by a Man in Black, follows closely. The boat rises impossibly high toward the Cliffs, with the Man in Black closing in but not fast enough. Inigo sails precisely at the Cliffs, and Fezzik grabs a rock, finds a rope, and swings it to the top. He straps a harness, lifts Buttercup and Vizzini, and ascends the rope with them. The Man in Black sails toward the Cliffs, watching Fezzik rise. Fezzik climbs swiftly, with Buttercup terrified. He's over a third of the way up when the Man in Black leaps to the rope, climbing rapidly. Fezzik increases his pace as the Man in Black closes in, cutting into Fezzik's lead. Vizzini leaps off, takes a knife, and begins cutting the rope tied to a rock, while Inigo helps the Princess and Fezzik waits for instructions.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: The Kid appears unchanged, still looking pale and weak, but there is a possibility that he is gripping the sheets with his hands a little too tightly. His Grandfather remains silent, simply waiting patiently. We find ourselves back in the boat. Buttercup is treading water, and we return to the exact moment we last saw her, with Buttercup frozen in place, the Shrieking Eel's jaws wide open, ready to clamp down. Suddenly, we witness a giant arm delivering a powerful blow, rendering the Eel unconscious in a single move, and then effortlessly lifting Buttercup. The boat and Fezzik are there, with Buttercup being gently placed on the deck. Inigo points behind them, indicating something of importance. Vizzini proceeds to tie Buttercup's hands securely. As dawn breaks, the boat is being closely pursued by the black sailboat, which we can now see for the first time is being sailed by a mysterious Man in Black. His boat almost seems to be flying across the water. Once he utters the name, they rise straight up, sheer from the water, impossibly high, engaging in a wild race toward the Cliffs. The Man in Black is closing in faster than ever, but not quite fast enough, as the lead was too substantial to overcome. As Inigo sails with great precision directly at the Cliffs, Fezzik reaches up along the cliff face, grabs hold of a jutting rock, and reaches behind it. Suddenly, a thick rope appears in his hands. He drops back to the boat, gives the rope a freeing swing, and it extends all the way to the top. He straps a harness to himself, then lifts Buttercup and Vizzini into the harness. Finally, he climbs into the harness himself. All three are securely strapped to Fezzik like papooses, and he begins to ascend the rope, carrying them all along with him as he climbs. The Man in Black is sailing toward the Cliffs of Insanity, observing as Fezzik rises swiftly through the first moments of dawn. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far below. This is the first time we've truly experienced the real vertigo feeling, and it's a breathtaking moment. Fezzik continues climbing. Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear. Fezzik is moving steadily; however high they are, he's already over a third of the way up. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, beginning his climb. He's impossibly far behind, but the way he ascends, you'd think he didn't realize that because he is flying up the rope, hand over hand, like lightning. He prods Fezzik, who nods in understanding, and increases his pace. The Man in Black is roaring up the rope, rapidly cutting into Fezzik's lead, and his arms begin moving much more slowly. Vizzini and the others are getting dangerously close now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off, takes out a knife, and begins to cut the rope, which is tied securely around a great rock, while Inigo assists the Princess to her feet, and Fezzik just stands around, waiting for someone to instruct him on what to do next.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: The Kid appears to be unchanged, as he still looks pale and weak, though there is a slight possibility that his hands may be gripping the sheets a little too tightly. His Grandfather remains silent, simply sitting by his side and waiting with quiet patience. We once again find ourselves back in the boat. Buttercup is treading water, and we return to the very exact moment where we last saw her, with Buttercup seemingly frozen in place, as the terrifying jaws of the Shrieking Eel are wide open, ready to clamp down. Suddenly, we witness a massive arm delivering a powerful, well-aimed blow, rendering the Eel unconscious in a single, decisive move, and then effortlessly lifting Buttercup from the water. The boat and Fezzik are present, with Buttercup being gently placed upon the deck by the giant. Inigo points behind them, indicating something of great importance. Vizzini proceeds to tie Buttercup's hands securely with rope. As dawn breaks, the boat is being closely pursued by the black sailboat, which for the first time we can now see is being sailed by a mysterious figure known as the Man in Black. His boat almost seems to be flying rapidly across the water's surface. Once he utters the name, they rise straight up, sheer from the water, impossibly high, engaging in a wild and thrilling race toward the imposing Cliffs. The Man in Black is closing the gap faster than ever but not quite fast enough, as their lead was too substantial to be easily overcome. As Inigo navigates with great precision directly at the Cliffs, Fezzik reaches up along the rugged cliff face, grabs hold of a jutting rock, and reaches behind it. Suddenly, a thick, sturdy rope appears in his hands. He drops back to the boat, gives the rope a freeing swing, and it extends all the way to the top. He straps a harness to himself, then lifts both Buttercup and Vizzini into the harness. Finally, he climbs into the harness himself. All three individuals are securely strapped to Fezzik like papooses, and he begins to ascend the rope, carrying them all along with him as he climbs upward. The Man in Black is sailing toward the Cliffs of Insanity, intently observing as Fezzik rises swiftly through the first light of dawn. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far below. This is the first time we've truly experienced the real, dizzying feeling of vertigo, and it's a breathtaking moment indeed. Fezzik continues climbing. Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear and nervousness. Fezzik is moving steadily; however high they are, he's already over a third of the way up. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, beginning his climb. Though he's impossibly far behind, the way he ascends makes you think he didn't realize that, because he is flying up the rope, hand over hand, with lightning speed. He nudges Fezzik, who nods in understanding, and increases his climbing pace. The Man in Black is roaring up the rope, rapidly closing the gap and cutting into Fezzik's lead, but now Fezzik's arms begin moving much more slowly. Vizzini and the others are getting dangerously close to the top now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off, takes out a knife, and begins to cut the rope that is tied securely around a great rock, while Inigo assists the Princess to her feet, and Fezzik just stands around, waiting for someone to instruct him on what to do next.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The Kid appears unchanged, still pale and weak, but there is a subtle tension in his hands as he grips the sheets a little too tightly. His Grandfather remains silent, simply waiting in the room. The scene shifts back to the boat, where Buttercup is treading water, her movements steady yet anxious. We return to the exact moment we last saw her, with Buttercup frozen in fear as the Shrieking Eel, its jaws wide open, prepares to strike. Suddenly, a giant arm comes crashing down, delivering a powerful blow that renders the Eel unconscious in a single, decisive move. With ease, the arm lifts Buttercup from the water and deposits her safely onto the deck of the boat. Fezzik stands there, having completed the rescue, while Inigo points behind them, drawing attention to the approaching threat. Vizzini quickly ties Buttercup's hands, securing her as the boat sails on. As dawn breaks, the black sailboat follows closely behind, and for the first time, we see that it is being sailed by a mysterious Man in Black. His boat seems to defy gravity, almost flying across the water. As he utters a name, the boat rises sharply from the water, soaring impossibly high in a wild race toward the Cliffs. The Man in Black closes the distance with remarkable speed, but the lead is too great to overcome. Inigo expertly navigates the boat straight at the Cliffs, while Fezzik reaches up along the cliff face, his hand finding a jutting rock. He reaches behind it and suddenly has a thick rope in his grasp. Dropping back to the boat, he swings the rope with a freeing motion, sending it all the way to the top of the cliff. He then straps a harness to himself, lifts Buttercup and Vizzini into the harness, and finally secures himself. All three are now strapped to Fezzik like papooses, and he begins to ascend the rope, carrying them upward with each powerful movement. Meanwhile, the Man in Black sails toward the Cliffs of Insanity, his eyes fixed on Fezzik's group, which is barely visible far below. This is the first time the true vertigo of the climb is felt, a breathtaking moment as Fezzik continues his ascent. Buttercup is nearly out of her mind with fear, but Fezzik moves steadily, already over a third of the way up. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, beginning his climb with astonishing speed. Despite being impossibly far behind, he climbs as if unaware of the distance, his hands moving up the rope with lightning speed. He prods Fezzik, who acknowledges the prompt with a nod and quickens his pace. The Man in Black races up the rope, rapidly closing the gap, but Fezzik's arms begin to slow as the strain takes its toll. Vizzini and the others are now perilously close to the top. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them when Vizzini leaps off, draws a knife, and starts cutting the rope tied around a great rock. Inigo assists the Princess to her feet, while Fezzik stands by, waiting for instructions, ready to act as the situation unfolds.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The Kid appears unchanged, still pale and weak, but his tight grip on the sheets suggests tension. His Grandfather remains silent, waiting. Back on the boat, Buttercup treads water as the Shrieking Eel approaches, jaws wide. Suddenly, a giant arm knocks the Eel unconscious and lifts Buttercup onto the deck, where Fezzik deposits her. Inigo points behind them as Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands. At dawn, a black sailboat, helmed by a Man in Black, follows closely, almost flying over the water. As Inigo expertly navigates toward the Cliffs, Fezzik secures a rope to the cliff face, swings it free, and attaches a harness. He lifts Buttercup and Vizzini into the harness, then joins them, ascending the rope with all three strapped to him. The Man in Black sails toward the Cliffs of Insanity, watching Fezzik's swift ascent. The vertigo-inducing climb is breathtaking, with Buttercup terrified. Fezzik progresses steadily, already a third of the way up. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, climbing rapidly and closing the gap. He urges Fezzik to quicken his pace. Despite Fezzik's efforts, the Man in Black gains ground, his speed relentless. As they near the top, Vizzini jumps off, draws a knife, and begins cutting the rope tied to a rock, while Inigo assists Buttercup and Fezzik waits for instructions.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The Kid looks the same, pale and weak, but maybe he's gripping the sheets a little too tightly with his hands. His Grandfather, who often reads stories to him that transport him to different worlds, says nothing, just waits. We're back in the boat, a small vessel that seems ill-equipped for the danger it faces. Buttercup is treading water in the chilly sea, her endurance a testament to her strong will. And we're back where we were at the last moment we saw her, Buttercup frozen in fear as the Shrieking Eel, a legendary sea creature rumored to terrify sailors across the world, jaws wide, is about to clamp down as we see a giant arm of Fezzik, known for his extraordinary strength, pounding the Eel unconscious in one move, then easily lifting Buttercup. The boat and Fezzik, with Buttercup being deposited on the deck. Inigo, a master swordsman with a personal vendetta driving him, points behind them. Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands with the skill of someone used to taking prisoners. The boat at dawn is being followed closely by the black sailboat, which we can see for the first time is being sailed by a Man in Black, a mysterious figure whose identity is a source of intrigue, and his boat almost seems to be flying with the speed of a racing craft. And once he's said the name, they rise straight up, sheer from the water, impossibly high in a wild race for the Cliffs of Insanity, legendary for their towering height and treacherous ascent, and the Man in Black is closing faster than ever, but not fast enough, the lead was too great to overcome, and as Inigo sails with great precision straight at the Cliffs, Fezzik reaches up along the cliff face, grabs a jutting rock with the ease of an experienced climber, reaches behind it. Suddenly there is a thick rope in his hands, an old contraption left by previous adventurers. He drops back to the boat, gives the rope a freeing swing, and the rope goes all the way to the top. He straps a harness to him, then lifts Buttercup and Vizzini in the harness with the care of a gentle giant. Finally, he himself gets in the harness. All three are strapped to Fezzik like papooses, a technique used by mountain climbers to carry their gear, and he starts to ascend the rope, carrying them all along with him as he goes. The Man in Black is sailing in toward the Cliffs of Insanity, watching as Fezzik rises swiftly through the first moments of dawn, the light casting long shadows across the jagged rocks. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far below. This is the first time we've gotten the real vertigo feeling, and it's a gasper. Fezzik climbing on. Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear, her heart pounding with each step higher. Fezzik is moving right along; however high they are, he's already over a third of the way done. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope, starting to climb. He's impossibly far behind, but the way he goes you'd think he didn't know that because he is flying up the rope, hand over hand like lightning. He prods Fezzik, who nods with the understanding of a fellow competitor, and increases his pace. The Man in Black is roaring up the rope, cutting deeply into Fezzik's lead, and his arms begin moving much more slowly, fatigue showing even on his strong frame. Vizzini and the others are getting too close now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off, takes out a knife with a glint of steel in the early morning sun, and begins to cut the rope, which is tied around a great rock that has weathered centuries, while Inigo helps the Princess to her feet and Fezzik just stands around, waiting for someone to tell him to do something, his loyalty and patience as enduring as the cliffs themselves.

On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. He straps a harness to him then lifts Buttercup and Vizzini in the harness. Finally he himself gets in the harness. All three are strapped to Fezzik like papooses and he starts to ascend the rope carrying them all along with him as he goes. The Man in Black is sailing in toward the Cliffs of Insanity watching as Fezzik rises swiftly through the first moments of dawn. Fezzik's group is only faintly visible far below. This is the first time we have gotten the real vertigo feeling and it is a gasper. Fezzik climbing on Buttercup is almost out of her mind with fear. Fezzik is moving right along however high they are. he is already over a third of the way done. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope starting to climb. He is impossibly far behind but the way he goes you would think he did not know that because he is flying up the rope hand over hand like lightning. He prods Fezzik who nods and increases his pace. The Man in Black is roaring up the rope cutting deeply into Fezzik's lead and his arms begin moving much more slowly. Vizzini and the others are getting too close now. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. Vizzini leaps off takes out a knife and begins to cut the rope which is tied around a great rock while Inigo helps the Princess to her feet and Fezzik just stands around waiting for someone to tell him to do something.

We are back in the boat. Buttercup is treading water. And we are back where we were at the last moment we saw her. Buttercup frozen the Shrieking Eel jaws wide about to clamp down as we see a giant arm pounding the Eel unconscious in one move then easily lifting Buttercup. The boat and Fezzik with Buttercup being deposited on the deck. he is already over a third of the way done. The Man in Black leaps from his ship to the rope starting to climb. The Man in Black is less than a hundred feet behind them. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The Pup appears unchanged, bright and energetic, but perhaps he's clutching the pillows a bit too loosely with his paws. His Uncle murmurs something, just listens. We're back on the train. Daffodil is paddling air. And we're back where we were at the last instant we glimpsed her, Daffodil frozen, the Howling Whale, mouth closed, about to chomp down as we observe a massive wing swatting the Whale asleep in one motion, then effortlessly hoisting Daffodil. The train and Hector, with Daffodil being placed on the platform. Eduardo gestures in front of them. Lorenzo wraps Daffodil's ankles. The train at midnight is being chased lazily by the white submarine, which we can perceive for the first time is being piloted by a Tiger in Blue, and his submarine almost seems to be drifting. And once he's whispered the word, they dive straight down, smooth into the clouds, surprisingly deep, in a calm sprint for the Caves, and the Tiger in Blue is lagging slower than ever, but not slow enough, the gap was too small to widen, and as Eduardo drifts with little accuracy straight at the Caves, Hector reaches down along the cave wall, catches a hanging vine, reaches in front of it. Abruptly there is a thin ladder in his paws. He springs forward to the train, tosses the ladder a tangled toss, and the ladder stretches all the way to the base. He belts a pouch to him, then raises Daffodil and Lorenzo in the pouch. Finally, he himself squeezes in the pouch. All three are clasped to Hector like backpacks, and he begins to descend the ladder, hauling them all along with him as he descends. The Tiger in Blue is drifting in away from the Caves of Lunacy, observing as Hector descends slowly through the last moments of midnight. Hector's team is only vaguely visible far above. This is the last time we've had the false excitement sensation, and it's a sleeper. Hector descending away. Daffodil is almost calm with calmness. Hector is pausing right here; however low they are, he's hardly over half of the journey complete. The Tiger in Blue dives from his plane to the ladder, pausing to slide. He's surprisingly close ahead, but the way he rests you'd think he didn't notice that because he is swimming down the ladder, foot under foot like thunder. He taps Hector, who waves, and decreases his speed. The Tiger in Blue is whispering down the ladder, adding slightly to Hector's gap, and his feet begin resting much more quickly. Lorenzo and the others are getting too distant now. The Tiger in Blue is more than two hundred yards ahead of them. Lorenzo pauses on, puts away a fork, and pauses to break the ladder, which is wrapped around a tiny tree, while Eduardo hinders the Turtle to his head and Hector simply sits down, ignoring everyone to tell him to ignore something.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The Kid appears pale and frail, clutching the sheets tightly. His Grandfather remains silent. On the boat, Buttercup treads water as a Shrieking Eel approaches, but Fezzik knocks it unconscious and lifts her aboard. Inigo points as Vizzini ties Buttercup's hands. As dawn breaks, they're pursued by a Man in Black on a fast black sailboat. Inigo expertly sails towards the Cliffs of Insanity. Fezzik uses a rope to ascend the cliffs with Buttercup and Vizzini strapped to him. The Man in Black, undeterred, leaps from his boat and rapidly climbs the rope, quickly narrowing the gap. Vizzini attempts to cut the rope as Inigo assists Buttercup, while Fezzik waits for instructions.
